snippet: CERTNER--Joel. Beloved brother, half Century since your tragic death on Sunday, April 10, 1966 at age 21. You are with me forever . Your Sister, Naomi Certner Klosner 1/3
lead_paragraph: CERTNER--Joel. Beloved brother, half Century since your tragic death on Sunday, April 10, 1966 at age 21. You are with me forever . Your Sister, Naomi Certner Klosner 1/3
